ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) 3) Evaluate each risk against its risk thresholds. 4) For each risk that does not meet its risk threshold, define and record recommended treatment strategies and measures. NOTE Risk treatment strategies include, but are not limited to, eliminating the risk, reducing its likelihood of occurrence or severity of consequence, or accepting the risk. Treatments also include taking or increasing risk in order to pursue an opportunity. Measures provide information about the effectiveness of the treatment alternatives. d) Treat risks. This activity consists of the following tasks: 1) Identify recommended alternatives for risk treatment. 2) Implement risk treatment
